snippet: After months of simmering tensions, the onetime political partners in Florida offered a preview of a fight that Mr. Bush and his allies see slipping from their grasp.

byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Bruising showdown between Sen Marco Rubio and Jeb Bush in latest Republican presidential debate sets friends and onetime political partners on collision path, altering dynamic between two camps; Rubio, under fire, is moving rapidly to woo establishment wing of Republican Party that Bush was previously believed to have secured.
lead_paragraph: After months of simmering tensions, the onetime political partners in Florida offered a preview of a fight that Mr. Bush and his allies see slipping from their grasp.

headline.print_headline: A Collision Path for Ex-Partners Rubio and Bush
headline.main: Past Partners, Marco Rubio and Jeb Bush Shift Directions
